page.title: 16Scotton Clubs
page.content: Scotton's oldest club founded in 1935, Scotton and District WI currently has 75 members (40 from Scotton, the rest from nearby villages). A lively and friendly group, it has a good proportion of young members and runs a range of activities (sport, drama, craft - and other - classes, outings etc.) Members help with Meals on Wheels and trolley shops for the residents of two local Rest Homes. Friendship Club for senior citizens meets weekly in the village hall for an informal, social afternoon. Self supporting the club runs outings and hosts a Christmas party for all village pensioners. Archery Club for adults and children meets weekly at Manor Farm in summer. Dance Club meets weekly from autumn to spring for sequence dancing: its future is un- certain as the instructors are moving.
